mapper.select: select gpt.giving_page_id as page_id, gpt.giving_name as page_title, ct.center_name, gpt.main_img_url as img_url, gt.giving_total as giving_total, gpt.category_id, ROUND(sum(gt.giving_total)/goal_total * 100) as achievement_rate from giving_page_tb gpt left outer join center_tb ct on(ct.center_id = gpt.center_id) left outer join giver_tb gt on(gt.giving_page_id = gpt.giving_page_id) where DATEDIFF(gpt.end_date, NOW()) >= 0 group by gpt.giving_page_id order by giving_total desc limit 4;

select fpt.funding_id AS page_id, fpt.funding_summary_name, fpt.funding_name AS page_title, IFNULL(ROUND((sum(if(ft.funder_id is null, null, rt.reward_price)) / fpt.goal_total) * 100), 0) as join_percent, fpt.main_img_url AS img_url from funding_page_tb fpt left outer join reward_tb rt on(rt.funding_id = fpt.funding_id) left outer join funder_tb ft on(ft.reward_id = rt.reward_id) group by page_id, page_title limit 3;
select count(distinct user_id) as giver_total, sum(giving_total) as giving_total_sum from giver_tb where giving_date = DATE(NOW());

select count(distinct ft.user_id) as funder_total, ifnull(sum(rt.reward_price), 0) as funding_price_total from funder_tb ft left outer join reward_tb rt on(rt.reward_id = ft.reward_id) where DATE(order_date) = DATE(NOW());
